Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 111th/Halsted
ShortDescription: Southbound 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed near Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing near Harlem/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing near Harlem/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
